story.soThat: I can remove cancelled or erroneous orders from my active list

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: From the order list or order detail page in the admin interface, I can select an order and choose to "Delete".
A confirmation prompt appears before deletion.
The order is permanently removed from the admin dashboard (FR012).

file.reason: A new DELETE /api/orders/:id route will be added.
The delete button and confirmation dialog will be added here.

constraints.constraint: A confirmation dialog must be shown before the destructive delete action is performed.

interface.name: DELETE /api/orders/:id
interface.reason: The endpoint to permanently delete an order.

ideas.idea: Write an E2E test that creates an order via API seeding, navigates to its detail page, deletes it, and asserts that it no longer appears in the admin order list.
